div.h2:
DIPS Documentation
All these are DIPS specific documentation which are details you need to know in addition to the FHIR Specification.
API Documentation
This explains in details, how to use the DIPS API for FHIR services. There are additional details on DIPS specific extentions, examples for requests and responses.
Install Documentation
This is a detailed guide on to install DIPS FHIR R4 packages.
Admin Documentation
There are configuration settings before you can use an installation of DIPS FHIR R4 packages.
